name: 7 Wonders
description:
In *7 Wonders*, you are the leader of one of the great cities of the ancient world. Your goal is to develop your city by gathering resources, building structures, and constructing your Wonder. The game is played over three ages, and each age consists of several rounds where players simultaneously choose a card to play. These cards provide resources, points, or military strength, and the choices you make influence both your city and your interactions with neighboring cities.

The game involves strategic decision-making, as you must balance the development of your Wonder with the growth of your city, while keeping an eye on your opponents' progress. Military conflicts are resolved at the end of each age, and you must decide how much to invest in military strength without neglecting other important areas like science or commerce.

*7 Wonders* offers a rich experience with multiple paths to victory. The game’s combination of resource management, tactical planning, and interaction with other players makes each game unique and highly replayable.

name: 7 Wonders Duel
description:
In *7 Wonders Duel*, two players compete to build civilizations in a fast-paced, two-player version of the classic *7 Wonders* game. Players take turns drafting cards to gather resources, build structures, and develop their military or scientific advancements. The game is played over three ages, and each age consists of drafting cards that offer different benefits, such as resource production, military strength, or science points.

The goal of the game is to either achieve military dominance, scientific supremacy, or accumulate the most points by the end of the third age. Military victories are achieved by advancing your military marker past your opponent’s, while scientific victories come from completing a set of science symbols.

*7 Wonders Duel* is a highly strategic game where each decision matters. Players must manage their resources efficiently, while also planning ahead for military and scientific advancements. The tight, interactive gameplay and constant tension between different paths to victory make *7 Wonders Duel* a compelling and replayable experience.

name: Agricola
description:
In *Agricola*, you're a farmer in a wooden shack with your spouse and little else. At first, each family member can take two actions, one for you and one for your spouse, from various farm-related tasks such as plowing fields, collecting materials, building fences, and so on. There are numerous choices available, and as the game progresses, new action cards are revealed, adding more options each round.

You might consider having children to get more work done, but you'll first need to expand your house to make room— and how will you feed all these little ones?

*Agricola* offers different levels of complexity through the use of Minor Improvement and Occupation cards. In the beginner version (Family Variant), these cards are not used. For more advanced play, the game includes three types of cards: Basic, Interactive, and Complex, allowing players to experiment with various combinations. Additional decks, like the Z-deck and L-deck, also exist. Players start with a hand of 7 Occupation and 7 Minor Improvement cards, which can shape their strategy throughout the game.

*Agricola* is a turn-based game, and the challenge is that each available action can only be taken by one player per round, so careful decision-making is key. There are countless strategies, some of which depend on your hand of cards. Sometimes it’s wise to stick to your plan, while other times it’s better to react to your opponents' actions.

expansions.name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small
Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small – Even More Buildings Big and Small
Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small – Even More Buildings Big and Small
Agricola: Farmers of the Moor
Agricola: World Championship Deck – 2011

name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small
Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small – Even More Buildings Big and Small
Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small – More Buildings Big and Small
Agricola: Farmers of the Moor
description:
*Agricola: Farmers of the Moor* is an expansion to the base game *Agricola*, adding new layers of depth and challenge. In this expansion, players must manage additional resources like fuel to heat their homes, and they face new challenges related to maintaining the health of their family members. Along with the usual farming activities, players must now clear forests, dig peat bogs for fuel, and deal with new building options.

The expansion introduces horses as a new type of livestock, and the added variety of minor improvements and major improvements cards expands strategic possibilities. Players must carefully balance fuel and food, as neglecting either can hinder their growth and lead to penalties.

*Farmers of the Moor* enriches the experience of *Agricola*, adding complexity while enhancing the immersion in the life of a farmer. With its new mechanics and challenges, this expansion offers an engaging experience for players looking for an advanced farming strategy game.

name: Android: Netrunner
description:
*Android: Netrunner* is an asymmetrical, two-player card game set in a dystopian cyberpunk future. One player takes on the role of a Runner—a hacker attempting to infiltrate the corporate world—while the other player plays as a Corporation, defending their assets and advancing their agendas. The game revolves around strategic deck-building, bluffing, and careful resource management.

Each player has unique goals: the Corporation aims to advance and score agendas, while setting up defenses to protect their servers, whereas the Runner tries to break through these defenses and access the Corporation’s data to sabotage their plans. With distinct card types and strategies for each side, players must make decisions about when to risk resources and how to outwit their opponent.

*Android: Netrunner* is a game of tension and tactical depth, with multiple paths to victory for both sides. The game’s asymmetrical gameplay, immersive theme, and strategic card interactions create a thrilling, high-stakes experience with a unique twist on traditional card games.

expansions.name: Android: Netrunner – Creation and Control
Android: Netrunner – Honor and Profit

name: Android: Netrunner – Creation and Control
description:
*Android: Netrunner – Creation and Control* is an expansion for the base game *Android: Netrunner*, focusing on the Shaper and Haas-Bioroid factions. This expansion introduces new cards and strategies that deepen the interactions and gameplay for both Runners and Corporations. Shapers gain tools for manipulating programs and breaking through Corporation defenses, while Haas-Bioroid receives cards to advance its agenda of building and protecting its servers with advanced ice and bioroid technology.

The expansion adds 55 new cards (three copies of each), including new identities, programs, hardware, and operations that allow for more varied deck-building options. Players can experiment with new tactical combinations and explore the unique strengths of Shapers and Haas-Bioroid, adding fresh strategic depth to the game.

*Creation and Control* enriches *Android: Netrunner* by enhancing the asymmetrical dynamics and providing fans of both factions with innovative ways to challenge their opponents, making it a must-have for dedicated players.

name: Android: Netrunner – Honor and Profit
description:
*Android: Netrunner – Honor and Profit* is an expansion for the base game *Android: Netrunner*, focusing on the Jinteki Corporation and Criminal Runner factions. This expansion introduces 55 new cards (three copies of each) that enhance the strategic options for both Jinteki and Criminals. Jinteki gains new traps and defensive tools designed to trick and punish aggressive Runners, while Criminals receive additional means to infiltrate servers and exploit corporate weaknesses.

With new identities, events, ice, and hardware, *Honor and Profit* brings fresh tactics to the table, allowing Jinteki players to refine their mind games and Criminal players to expand their versatile, high-stakes approach. The expansion emphasizes the psychological warfare between Runners and Corporations, heightening the game’s tension and depth.

*Honor and Profit* enriches *Android: Netrunner* by providing unique gameplay dynamics and new layers of strategic interaction for Jinteki and Criminal factions, making it an essential addition for fans of these playstyles.

name: Ascension: Realms Unraveled
userComment: Outstanding.  My favorite version of Ascension.

name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
Carcassonne
description:
In *Carcassonne*, you take turns drawing and placing tiles to build a medieval landscape with cities, roads, cloisters, and fields. Each tile you place must connect with the existing tiles in a way that creates continuous features. As you build, you can place your followers (meeples) on cities, roads, cloisters, or fields to score points. The game ends when all tiles have been placed, and the player with the most points wins.

The challenge in *Carcassonne* lies in choosing the right tile and the right moment to place your follower. The game offers numerous strategies, such as building large cities or long roads, or strategically placing followers on fields to score points at the end of the game. You must also consider your opponents' moves, as they can block your plans by claiming features before you do.

*Carcassonne* is a simple yet strategic game that offers deep gameplay despite its straightforward rules. The balance between offensive and defensive moves creates an engaging experience, where every tile placement matters.

name: Castle Panic: The Wizard's Tower – Crossbow Promo
The Castles of Burgundy
description:
In *The Castles of Burgundy*, players take on the roles of aristocrats in 15th century France, seeking to develop their estates and gain prestige. The game revolves around strategic tile placement, resource management, and timing as players select tiles to add to their personal estates. Each turn, players roll dice that determine which actions they can take, such as acquiring tiles, placing tiles on their board, or trading goods.

With a variety of tile types—castles, settlements, livestock, ships, and mines—players can develop their estates in different ways, creating unique combinations for points. Timing and planning are key, as players must balance immediate gains with long-term strategies to maximize their score by the game’s end.

*The Castles of Burgundy* is a deeply strategic game that combines tactical decisions with luck-based elements. Its rich, replayable gameplay and varied strategies offer a rewarding experience for players who enjoy building and optimizing their own medieval estates.

name: Castles of Mad King Ludwig: Secrets
Catan Histories: Settlers of America – Trails to Rails
Concordia
description:
In *Concordia*, players assume the roles of powerful Roman merchants expanding their trade networks across the ancient Mediterranean. Using a unique deck-building mechanic, players play cards to take actions, such as moving colonists, trading resources, and establishing new settlements. Careful management of resources like brick, food, tools, wine, and cloth is essential to developing a thriving trade empire.

The game emphasizes strategy and planning, as each card played not only grants immediate actions but also affects end-game scoring. Players must carefully consider their expansion across the map, while also acquiring additional cards to enhance their decks and gain valuable points.

*Concordia* offers a harmonious blend of resource management, tactical planning, and competition. With its elegant mechanics and lack of direct conflict, *Concordia* provides a satisfying experience for players who enjoy strategic games with a focus on building and optimizing trade networks.

expansions.name: Concordia: Britannia / Germania
Concordia: Salsa

name: Concordia: Britannia / Germania
description:
*Concordia: Britannia / Germania* is an expansion for the base game *Concordia*, introducing two new maps—Britannia and Germania—that offer unique challenges and strategic opportunities. The Britannia map focuses on the British Isles, with limited access to resources and tighter competition, while the Germania map emphasizes expansion across the rivers and forests of central Europe, encouraging a different approach to trade and settlement.

Both maps add fresh dynamics and a new layer of complexity, as players must adapt their strategies to the distinct geography and resource distribution of each region. This expansion enhances the replayability of *Concordia*, allowing players to explore new routes and tactics in the Roman Empire’s northern territories.

*Britannia / Germania* provides *Concordia* fans with additional variety and depth, making it an ideal expansion for players looking to expand their trade networks in new and challenging settings.

name: Concordia: Salsa
description:
*Concordia: Salsa* is an expansion for *Concordia*, adding new cards, new strategies, and a new way to play the game. This expansion introduces the concept of 'Salsa' cards, which give players additional actions and offer strategic advantages. Players can use these cards to boost their economic and military power, influencing their tactics and overall approach to the game.

*Concordia: Salsa* also introduces the 'Tributary' mechanic, which allows players to build new connections between regions, further diversifying the game's strategic possibilities. The expansion enhances the core *Concordia* experience by offering more variety and tactical depth, making it an ideal addition for players looking to explore new ways to manage their Roman empire.

This expansion adds fresh elements without altering the core mechanics of *Concordia*, allowing fans to enjoy new challenges while maintaining the elegance and strategic focus of the original game.

name: Cosmic Encounter
description:
In *Cosmic Encounter*, players take on the roles of powerful alien species, each with unique abilities, as they work to conquer the galaxy. The game is a mix of negotiation, strategy, and alliance-building, where players aim to complete their secret mission of controlling five planets. Players can form alliances, betray one another, and use their alien powers to manipulate the outcome of battles.

Each turn, players choose to attack another player or defend their own planets. The outcome of battles is influenced by cards, alliances, and the special abilities of the alien species in play. The game's dynamic nature encourages players to adapt their strategies, form temporary alliances, and decide when to break them to achieve victory.

*Cosmic Encounter* is a highly interactive and unpredictable game that offers endless replayability. With a wide variety of alien powers and ever-changing alliances, each game is a unique experience full of negotiation, bluffing, and strategic depth.

expansions.name: Cosmic Encounter: Cosmic Incursion

name: Cosmic Encounter: Cosmic Incursion
description:
*Cosmic Encounter: Cosmic Incursion* is an expansion for *Cosmic Encounter*, adding new alien species and more variety to the base game. This expansion introduces 20 new alien powers, each with its own unique ability, which allows for fresh strategies and interactions in every game. Players can now encounter even more diverse species, creating new dynamics and opportunities for negotiation and conflict.

In addition to the new aliens, *Cosmic Incursion* adds more cards and components to enhance gameplay. With the expansion, players can experience new alliances, betrayals, and unexpected turns of fate, increasing the unpredictability and excitement of the game.

*Cosmic Incursion* expands on the chaotic fun of *Cosmic Encounter*, providing new ways to challenge opponents, strengthen alliances, and achieve victory. This expansion is perfect for fans of *Cosmic Encounter* looking for even more variety and replayability.

name: Crokinole
description:
*Crokinole* is a classic dexterity game that dates back to 1876, often considered one of the greatest traditional tabletop games. Played on a circular board, the objective is to flick wooden discs into the highest-scoring regions at the center of the board while avoiding the outer edges. Players take turns attempting to land their discs in scoring zones while trying to knock opponents' discs out of the way.

The game is a combination of skill, precision, and strategy, as players must judge distances, angles, and timing to outmaneuver their opponents. *Crokinole* is typically played by two or four players, with each player trying to accumulate points by landing their discs in the central area or knocking opposing discs out of scoring positions.

With its simple yet engaging mechanics, *Crokinole* has endured for over a century as a fun and competitive game that is easy to learn but challenging to master. The tactile enjoyment of flicking the discs and the strategic decisions involved make *Crokinole* a beloved classic for players of all ages.

name: Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game
Dead of Winter: The Long Night
Defenders of the Realm: Hero Expansion #1
Defenders of the Realm: Hero Expansion #2
Defenders of the Realm: Hero Expansion #3
Defenders of the Realm: The Dragon Expansion
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)
description:
*Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)* is a cooperative, dungeon-crawling board game where one player acts as the Overlord, controlling the monsters and challenges, while the other players take on the roles of heroes working together to complete quests and defeat the Overlord's forces. Set in the fantasy world of Terrinoth, the game combines tactical combat, exploration, and character progression.

Players choose from a variety of hero classes, each with unique abilities, and can improve their characters with new skills, equipment, and powers over the course of a campaign. The Overlord, in turn, deploys monsters, lays traps, and attempts to hinder the heroes’ progress, adding a layer of strategy and tension to each encounter.

*Descent: Journeys in the Dark* offers a richly thematic experience, with varied quests and scenarios that make each playthrough unique. The game’s blend of cooperative strategy, adventure, and character development has made it a favorite among fans of fantasy and dungeon-crawling games.

expansions.name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Dark Elements
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Forgotten Souls
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Labyrinth of Ruin
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Lair of the Wyrm
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Nature's Ire

name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Dark Elements
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Forgotten Souls
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Labyrinth of Ruin
description:
*Descent: Labyrinth of Ruin* is an expansion for *Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)*, introducing a new campaign set in the ruins of a forgotten city. This expansion offers a fresh narrative with new quests, monsters, and challenges for players to overcome. Heroes venture into an ancient labyrinth filled with traps, powerful adversaries, and hidden treasures, all while unraveling a dark mystery.

In addition to a new story-driven campaign, *Labyrinth of Ruin* introduces four new heroes, each with unique abilities, and new classes that add variety to the heroes’ skills and strategies. The Overlord also gains new powers and tools, including new monsters and traps, increasing the tactical options for opposing the heroes.

*Labyrinth of Ruin* enriches the *Descent* experience by providing a thrilling and challenging adventure, perfect for players looking to expand the scope and depth of their *Descent* campaigns.

name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Lair of the Wyrm
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Nature's Ire
Discoveries: The Journals of Lewis & Clark
Dixit
description:
In *Dixit*, players explore their imagination through storytelling and creativity. Each round, one player becomes the storyteller, choosing a card from their hand and giving a clue that can be a word, phrase, or sound that describes the card. Other players then select a card from their own hand that best matches the clue, and all chosen cards are shuffled and revealed. The goal is for players to guess which card belongs to the storyteller.

Points are awarded based on whether players can guess the storyteller's card without making it too obvious. Players must balance between giving clues that are too clear or too vague, as points are only awarded if some, but not all, players guess correctly.

*Dixit* is a whimsical and beautifully illustrated game that encourages creativity and interpretation. The game’s open-ended storytelling and vibrant artwork make each playthrough unique, sparking conversation and imagination among players.

name: Dominion
description:
*Dominion* is a deck-building card game where players compete to build the most prosperous kingdom by acquiring cards that add wealth, actions, and victory points to their decks. Starting with a small deck of basic cards, players expand their options by purchasing new cards each turn, aiming to create powerful combinations that maximize their resources and abilities.

Each turn, players can perform actions, buy new cards, and organize their decks to build an efficient engine that drives their strategy. The game offers multiple paths to victory, allowing players to focus on accumulating wealth, enhancing their action potential, or gaining victory points directly.

With a variety of card types and endless possible combinations, *Dominion* is highly replayable and strategic, appealing to fans of resource management and engine-building. Its straightforward mechanics make it easy to learn, while its depth ensures an engaging experience for players who enjoy optimizing their strategies.

name: Dominion: Prosperity
description:
*Dominion: Prosperity* is an expansion for the deck-building game *Dominion*, adding a wealth-focused theme that introduces higher-value treasure and victory cards, as well as powerful new actions. In this expansion, players have access to Platinum and Colony cards, which allow for bigger turns and higher point totals, emphasizing long-term strategy and resource management.

*Prosperity* also includes new Kingdom cards that provide advanced ways to gain wealth and victory points, encouraging players to build grander, more efficient decks. The expansion’s focus on luxury and wealth changes the pacing of the game, rewarding players who can accumulate large amounts of treasure and capitalize on high-cost cards.

With its introduction of new mechanics and a focus on riches, *Dominion: Prosperity* adds depth and variety, making it a favorite among fans looking to enhance their *Dominion* experience with greater rewards and strategic options.

name: Dungeons & Dragons Dice Masters: Battle for Faerûn
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Aarakocra Troop Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Ballista Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Frost Giant Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Green Dragon Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Hobgoblin Troop Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Movanic Deva Angel Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Shadow Black Dragon Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Sun Elf Troop Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Sun Elf Wizard Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – White Dragon Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Attack Wing – Wraith Expansion Pack
Dungeons & Dragons: Castle Ravenloft Board Game
Dungeons & Dragons: Temple of Elemental Evil Board Game
Dungeons & Dragons: The Legend of Drizzt Board Game
Dungeons & Dragons: Wrath of Ashardalon Board Game
Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy
description:
*Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy* is a strategic, space exploration board game where players lead an interstellar civilization, competing for dominance in a vast galaxy. Each player controls a unique species with special abilities, guiding them through exploration, resource management, scientific research, and military expansion. The game combines elements of 4X (eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, eXterminate) with deep tactical choices.

Players can build fleets, upgrade their ships, colonize new sectors, and establish alliances, all while balancing their economy and defending their territories. The game’s modular board and variety of technological advancements create a dynamic and ever-changing universe where players must adapt their strategies to the evolving board state and their opponents’ actions.

With its rich strategic depth and high replayability, *Eclipse* offers an engaging and challenging experience, ideal for fans of space-themed games that enjoy intricate planning, diplomacy, and epic battles.

expansions.name: Eclipse: Rise of the Ancients
Eclipse: Supernova

name: Eclipse: Rise of the Ancients
description:
*Eclipse: Rise of the Ancients* is an expansion for *Eclipse: New Dawn for the Galaxy*, introducing new factions, technologies, and gameplay mechanics that enhance the strategic depth and variety of the base game. This expansion adds ancient alien artifacts, new ship parts, and powerful new discoveries that players can use to strengthen their fleets and develop unique strategies.

*Rise of the Ancients* also introduces new alien species with distinct abilities, as well as additional objectives, creating more paths to victory and encouraging diverse gameplay styles. The expansion’s new mechanics, like rare technologies and ancient enemies, add further challenges, rewarding players who adapt to the ever-evolving galaxy.

With its added complexity and variety, *Eclipse: Rise of the Ancients* is a must-have for fans looking to expand their interstellar experience and explore new facets of galactic conquest.

name: Eldritch Horror
description:
*Eldritch Horror* is a cooperative, horror-themed board game where players take on the roles of investigators working to prevent the awakening of ancient, world-ending entities. Inspired by the works of H.P. Lovecraft, the game transports players across the globe as they uncover mysteries, battle monstrous creatures, and face unimaginable horrors.

Each investigator has unique abilities and resources that help the team face encounters, gain allies, and collect artifacts in a race against time. Players must work together to close gates to other dimensions, gather clues, and prevent doom from spreading, all while managing their sanity and health.

With its immersive storytelling, challenging gameplay, and rich theme, *Eldritch Horror* offers a thrilling, unpredictable adventure for fans of horror and cooperative strategy games. The game’s many scenarios and ancient beings ensure a fresh and intense experience with every playthrough.

expansions.name: Eldritch Horror: Forsaken Lore

name: Eldritch Horror: Forsaken Lore
description:
*Eldritch Horror: Forsaken Lore* is an expansion for *Eldritch Horror*, adding new mysteries, encounters, and the ancient serpent-like creature, Yig, for players to confront. This expansion introduces additional Mythos cards, location encounters, and artifacts, expanding the base game’s variety and increasing the challenges investigators will face as they race to stop the end of the world.

*Forsaken Lore* enriches the game’s narrative depth and brings new threats, with more complex conditions and curses that add twists to the gameplay. It provides an even darker and more immersive experience, making each investigation feel fresh and more perilous.

This expansion is perfect for *Eldritch Horror* fans looking to enhance their adventures and uncover even more secrets within the Lovecraftian universe.

name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple
Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Expansion 1: Illusions
Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Expansion 2: Quest
A Feast for Odin
description:
*A Feast for Odin* is a strategy board game that immerses players in the life of Viking settlers, where they manage resources, explore new territories, and develop their society. Each player oversees a small Viking community, using worker placement to perform various actions such as hunting, trading, crafting, and pillaging, with the ultimate goal of growing their wealth and prosperity.

Throughout the game, players gather and arrange goods on a personal board, filling spaces to avoid penalties and strategically placing items to increase their points. The game offers a wealth of action choices, allowing players to customize their strategies, expand their settlements, and overcome seasonal challenges.

With its rich theme, intricate mechanics, and open-ended strategy, *A Feast for Odin* is a deep and rewarding experience that appeals to fans of resource management and historical games.

name: Fields of Arle
description:
*Fields of Arle* is a farming and resource management board game set in the rural landscape of East Frisia, where players develop their own farmland over the course of nine half-year seasons. Each player manages land, raises livestock, and produces goods, with actions that vary depending on the season. The game’s detailed mechanics allow for activities such as plowing fields, constructing buildings, and acquiring vehicles to optimize production and transport.

With numerous strategic options and a focus on planning, *Fields of Arle* offers a thoughtful, immersive experience, especially designed for solo or two-player gameplay. The game’s deep historical theme and intricate economic system make it a favorite for fans of simulation and farming strategy games.

name: Five Tribes: The Artisans of Naqala
description:
*Five Tribes: The Artisans of Naqala* is an expansion for *Five Tribes*, adding new mechanics and options for players to explore. This expansion introduces the Artisans, a new tribe that can craft powerful items to influence the game, adding a new layer of strategy. It also includes new tiles, new tribes, and additional victory point opportunities, further enriching the already dynamic gameplay.

The Artisans can create valuable goods that provide players with bonuses, as well as more ways to gain points and control territories. This expansion deepens the strategic choices available, making the game even more engaging and varied for players looking for more depth in their *Five Tribes* experience.

With new twists and additional strategies, *The Artisans of Naqala* enhances the replayability and complexity of *Five Tribes*, offering new challenges for both new and experienced players.

name: Five Tribes: The Djinns of Naqala
description:
*Five Tribes* is a strategic board game set in the mythical land of Naqala, where players control one of five different tribes, each with unique abilities, in a battle for power and influence. The game combines elements of worker placement, area control, and resource management as players use the tribes' influence to manipulate the market, gather resources, and influence the various regions of the board.

Players take turns moving tribes of different colors around the board, activating their powers and gaining valuable resources. The goal is to collect the most victory points by the end of the game, earned through a combination of strategic placement, clever use of tribe abilities, and purchasing valuable tiles.

With its rich, immersive theme and highly tactical gameplay, *Five Tribes* is a game that rewards careful planning, adaptability, and foresight.

expansions.name: Five Tribes: The Artisans of Naqala

name: Flash Point: Fire Rescue – Extreme Danger
Flash Point: Fire Rescue – Veteran and Rescue Dog
Imperial Settlers: Why Can't We Be Friends
Isle of Skye: From Chieftain to King
Jamaica
description:
In *Jamaica*, players take on the role of pirate captains competing in a race around the island of Jamaica. The goal is to complete the circuit first while gathering treasure and engaging in naval combat with other players. Each turn, players roll dice to determine available actions for the day and night, allowing them to move, gather supplies, or engage in battles.

The game combines strategic planning with luck, as players must manage their resources—food, gunpowder, and gold—while navigating around the island and anticipating opponents’ moves. Combat adds excitement, as players can raid other ships to steal treasures or supplies, but must be careful not to exhaust their resources.

*Jamaica* is a lively, family-friendly game that blends racing, resource management, and pirate-themed battles. The game’s fast pace, colorful artwork, and interactive mechanics make it an entertaining experience for players of all ages.

name: Legendary Encounters: An Alien Deck Building Game
The Lord of the Rings Dice Building Game
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
description:
*The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game* is a cooperative living card game (LCG) set in the iconic world of J.R.R. Tolkien’s Middle-earth. Players take on the roles of heroes from the books, such as Aragorn, Frodo, and Gandalf, as they embark on quests to thwart the dark forces threatening the land. The game features a unique deck-building mechanic, where players build their own decks of heroes, allies, events, and attachments to face the challenges ahead.

Each scenario presents a different challenge, from battling orcs to navigating dangerous wilderness, with players working together to complete quests while managing threats and overcoming obstacles. The game’s story-driven campaigns and evolving mechanics provide endless replayability and a rich, immersive experience for fans of the books and cooperative card games.

With its focus on strategy, teamwork, and narrative, *The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game* offers a compelling, dynamic experience in the beloved world of Middle-earth.

expansions.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Heirs of Númenor
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Khazad-dûm
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Black Riders
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hobbit: On the Doorstep

The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Road Darkens
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Treason of Saruman
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Voice of Isengard

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Heirs of Númenor
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Khazad-dûm
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Black Riders
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hobbit: On the Doorstep
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hobbit: Over Hill and Under Hill
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Lost Realm
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Road Darkens

Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King Deck-Building Game
Love Letter: The Hobbit – The Battle of the Five Armies
Mage Knight Board Game
description:
*Mage Knight Board Game* is a complex and strategic fantasy adventure game where players take on the roles of powerful Mage Knights, exploring and conquering a rich and dangerous world. The game combines elements of deck-building, role-playing, and exploration as players journey across an expansive map, battling enemies, completing quests, and gaining powerful abilities to improve their character.

Each Mage Knight is equipped with a unique set of skills and abilities that allow for different playstyles, offering a high level of replayability. Players can either choose to ally with or fight against different factions, build their decks with spells, actions, and items, and fight formidable enemies in tactical combat. The game includes a solo mode, and the cooperative mode allows players to team up and face the world’s challenges together.

With deep strategy, intricate gameplay mechanics, and a rich fantasy theme, *Mage Knight Board Game* offers a challenging experience for fans of adventure and strategy games.

expansions.name: Mage Knight Board Game: Krang Character Expansion
Mage Knight Board Game: The Lost Legion Expansion

name: Mage Knight Board Game: Krang Character Expansion
description:
*Mage Knight Board Game: Krang Character Expansion* introduces a new character, Krang, a powerful and unique Mage Knight with special abilities and playstyle. Krang's deck offers new strategic options, providing players with more variety in their gameplay and additional challenges to face as they explore the world of *Mage Knight*.

This expansion allows players to incorporate Krang into their adventures, offering new interactions with the game’s core mechanics, such as enhanced combat abilities and the potential to form different strategies depending on Krang’s abilities. With Krang's addition, players can enjoy fresh, dynamic gameplay and a new level of depth to the base game.

For fans of *Mage Knight*, the Krang expansion provides more opportunities for customization, further expanding the already vast world and gameplay possibilities.

name: Mage Knight Board Game: The Lost Legion Expansion
description:
*Mage Knight Board Game: The Lost Legion Expansion* adds a new set of challenges and opportunities to *Mage Knight*, introducing a new faction: The Lost Legion. This expansion brings new enemies, locations, and quests to explore, along with additional rule variations and mechanics that increase the game’s complexity.

The Lost Legion brings new units and enemy types to battle, adding more tactical depth and challenges. Players will need to adapt their strategies to face these new threats while continuing to explore the world and complete their quests. With additional components like new advanced rules and the introduction of the Lost Legion’s powerful forces, this expansion offers even more variety and replayability for *Mage Knight* fans.

*The Lost Legion Expansion* enhances the strategic depth of *Mage Knight*, making the game even more immersive and engaging with new content and exciting challenges.

name: Myrmes
description:
In *Myrmes*, players control an ant colony in an attempt to grow and thrive while competing against other colonies. The game is played over several rounds, where players take actions to gather resources, build their nest, and send out workers to forage, explore, and battle. Players must manage their worker ants and resources carefully to expand their colony and gain points.

The game offers strategic depth as players balance between offense and defense, with opportunities to raid other colonies or defend their own. The different types of ants—workers, warriors, and queens—offer unique abilities, and players must adapt their strategy based on the changing game board and the actions of their opponents.

*Myrmes* is a highly strategic game, where managing the growth of your colony, controlling territories, and making tactical decisions at the right time are key to success. The dynamic interactions between players and the varying strategies make each game a unique experience.

name: Orléans
description:
*Orléans* is a medieval-themed strategy board game where players build their own guilds and work to expand their influence in the city of Orléans and beyond. Set in 15th century France, the game features a unique combination of bag-building and resource management mechanics, where players gather followers to help them complete various tasks such as trade, construction, and development.

Through careful planning and strategic use of their followers, players aim to grow their wealth, improve their standing, and achieve victory points. The game offers multiple paths to success, from accumulating wealth to achieving objectives related to buildings, trade, and military presence. Each action requires balancing the needs of the guild, with new opportunities arising as the game progresses.

With its deep strategic choices, beautiful artwork, and replayability, *Orléans* offers a rich and immersive experience for players who enjoy tactical decision-making and historical themes.

expansions.name: Orléans: Invasion

name: Orléans: Invasion
description:
*Orléans: Invasion* is an expansion for *Orléans*, introducing new mechanics, challenges, and objectives that enhance the base game. Set during the invasions of France in the 15th century, this expansion adds new factions, including invading forces that threaten the stability of the region. Players must defend the city while continuing to grow their guilds, making strategic decisions to balance defense and expansion.

The expansion introduces new modules, such as the siege mechanism, new buildings, and military actions, which add depth and complexity to the game. Players now have to contend with the added pressure of managing invasions, which can affect their resources and plans. New objectives and strategies emerge as the game evolves, offering fresh opportunities for players to explore.

With *Orléans: Invasion*, the game becomes even more dynamic and challenging, offering new ways to experience the historical theme and strategic gameplay of *Orléans*.

name: Pandemic Legacy: Season 1
description:
*Pandemic Legacy: Season 1* is a cooperative campaign game that takes place over a series of 12 to 24 sessions, with each session representing a month in the story. Players work together as members of a disease control team, tasked with stopping the spread of four deadly diseases around the globe. What sets *Pandemic Legacy* apart from the base game is its evolving story, where choices made in earlier sessions have permanent effects on the game’s rules, components, and narrative.

The game introduces new mechanics as the story progresses, including new characters, events, and ways to interact with the world. Each month brings new challenges, and the players’ actions are recorded, leading to changes that persist through the campaign. The game’s legacy system also includes the addition of stickers, cards, and sealed components that are revealed as players advance.

*Pandemic Legacy: Season 1* offers a unique and deeply immersive experience, with a gripping story and challenging decisions that will keep players engaged and invested in the outcome. The sense of progression and the ever-changing nature of the game make it a memorable, highly replayable experience for fans of cooperative gameplay.

name: Pandemic: Contagion
description:
*Pandemic: Contagion* is a fast-paced, competitive card game set in the *Pandemic* universe. Unlike the cooperative nature of the original *Pandemic*, this game flips the concept, with players competing to spread diseases rather than cure them. Each player controls a disease, aiming to infect as many cities as possible while hindering their opponents' progress.

The game uses similar mechanics to *Pandemic*, with players drawing cards to spread their diseases, while also using action points to evolve and mutate their diseases in various ways. Players must decide when to aggressively expand their infection network or when to hold back to sabotage others. Strategic decisions, careful timing, and efficient management of resources are key to winning.

*Pandemic: Contagion* offers a unique twist on the *Pandemic* series, providing a different gameplay experience with a competitive edge, making it ideal for fans of the original game looking for a faster, more cutthroat version.

expansions.name: Pandemic: In the Lab
Pandemic: On the Brink
Pandemic: State of Emergency
Pandemic: The Cure

Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles – "Ranzak" Promo Character Card Set

Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Skull & Shackles Adventure Deck 4 – Island of Empty Eyes
Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Wrath of the Righteous – Base Set
Pathfinder Adventure Card Game: Wrath of the Righteous – Character Add-On Deck
Puerto Rico
description:
In *Puerto Rico*, players take on the roles of colonial governors, developing the island of Puerto Rico during the age of colonial trade. The game is centered around managing resources, building plantations, and constructing buildings to gain victory points. Players choose roles each round, with each role providing specific actions, such as producing goods, shipping them to Europe, or constructing buildings that offer various advantages.

The game features a highly strategic economy, where players must balance between planting crops, managing resources, and shipping goods. Timing and resource management are key to success, as players must make decisions that will impact their ability to expand their estates and outproduce their opponents.

*Puerto Rico* is a game of strategic depth, where every action has consequences. The role selection mechanic and the player-driven economy create a dynamic and competitive experience, with many ways to accumulate victory points and secure dominance in the colony.

name: Puerto Rico: Expansion I – New Buildings
Race for the Galaxy
description:
*Race for the Galaxy* is a fast-paced card game where players compete to build the most powerful space empire. The game revolves around exploring new planets, developing advanced technologies, and engaging in trade, all while managing resources and expanding your influence in the galaxy.

In *Race for the Galaxy*, each player starts with a small empire and works to grow it by playing cards representing planets, developments, and various actions. The game’s unique action system allows players to choose from a set of available actions, but only the player who selects the action will fully benefit from it. This creates a dynamic and interactive experience as players must adapt to the actions of their opponents.

The game offers numerous strategies, from military conquests to economic dominance, and the large variety of cards ensures no two games are the same. *Race for the Galaxy* is a deep and engaging game with a lot of replay value, ideal for fans of space-themed strategy games.

expansions.name: Race for the Galaxy: Alien Artifacts
Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Race for the Galaxy: Xeno Invasion

name: Race for the Galaxy: Alien Artifacts
Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
description:
*Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm* is an expansion for the popular card game *Race for the Galaxy*, introducing new cards, strategies, and mechanics to enhance the base game. This expansion adds new developments, worlds, and game-changing abilities that create more complex and exciting interactions between players.

One of the key features of *The Gathering Storm* is the introduction of two new types of cards: the 'Gathering Storm' cards and the 'Trade' cards. These bring new ways to earn victory points, manage resources, and manipulate the game’s economy. Additionally, the expansion introduces new victory conditions, such as different types of objectives and scoring strategies, adding even more replayability to the game.

*Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm* expands the strategic depth of the base game, making it a must-have for fans of the *Race for the Galaxy* series who are looking for new challenges, synergies, and tactical options.

name: Race for the Galaxy: Xeno Invasion
Railways of Europe
description:
*Railways of Europe* is a strategic railroad-building game set in Europe, where players compete to construct and operate rail networks across various countries. The goal is to build efficient railways, connect cities, and complete lucrative routes while managing resources and optimizing train operations.

In *Railways of Europe*, players start by developing their own railway companies, bidding for routes, and expanding their networks. The game introduces elements such as geographical obstacles, economic challenges, and competition between players for control of the most profitable routes. Players must carefully plan their rail lines, invest in new technologies, and build stations in key locations to maximize their income and outmaneuver their rivals.

The game offers a rich combination of strategy and tactics, with multiple paths to victory. The variety of possible routes and strategies, combined with the evolving market conditions, provides a dynamic and replayable experience for fans of railway-themed board games.

expansions.name: Railways of the World
Railways of the World: Event Deck

name: Railways of the World: Event Deck
The Resistance: Hidden Agenda & Hostile Intent
Rivals for Catan: Age of Darkness
Rivals for Catan: Age of Enlightenment
Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age
Roll Through the Ages: The Iron Age
Scythe
description:
In *Scythe*, players take on the role of faction leaders in an alternate-history 1920s Europe, where each faction controls unique units, structures, and abilities. The goal is to gather resources, expand your territory, and build up your economy to gain control over key areas of the map. Players use a combination of military strength, economic development, and strategic positioning to outmaneuver their opponents and achieve victory.

The game is played over several rounds, with each player taking actions to move, deploy units, gain resources, or engage in combat. Players must manage their resources efficiently, making choices between upgrading their abilities, deploying mechs, and expanding their territory. Combat is resolved using cards, adding an element of uncertainty and strategy.

*Scythe* is a deeply strategic game, combining area control, resource management, and combat. The asymmetric factions, diverse strategies, and dynamic board make every game a unique and engaging experience, with multiple paths to victory.

name: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: The Thames Murders & Other Cases
Smash Up: Science Fiction Double Feature
Smash Up: The Big Geeky Box
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game: Mission Pack 1
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game: Space Marine Pack 1
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game: Tyranid Enemy Pack
Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Next Generation
Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Next Generation – Next Phase
Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Original Series
Summoner Wars: Alliances Master Set
description:
*Summoner Wars: Alliances Master Set* is a tactical, card-driven battle game where players control powerful summoners and their respective factions in strategic duels. This master set introduces new alliances between the game's original factions, expanding the possibilities for tactical gameplay and introducing new combinations of abilities, units, and strategies.

In *Summoner Wars: Alliances Master Set*, players summon units, cast spells, and move their forces across a battlefield, seeking to defeat their opponent's summoner. The set includes two new factions, the 'Vanguards' and the 'Tundra Orcs', along with updated rules for playing multiple factions together, creating fresh challenges and exciting tactical options.

The game features highly customizable decks and allows for various playstyles, from aggressive attacks to defensive strategies. The *Alliances Master Set* expands the game's depth, offering even more ways for players to create unique strategies and combinations. With its tactical complexity and easy-to-learn mechanics, *Summoner Wars* is perfect for players looking for a deep, engaging experience with every match.

expansions.name: Summoner Wars: Fallen Kingdom Faction Deck
Summoner Wars: Guild Dwarves vs Cave Goblins

Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs Tundra Orcs

Survive: Escape from Atlantis! - 5-6 Player Mini Expansion
Survive: Escape from Atlantis! - Dolphins & Dive Dice Mini Extension
Talisman (Revised 4th Edition): The Sacred Pool Expansion
Terraforming Mars
description:
*Terraforming Mars* is a strategy board game set in the 2400s, where players take on the role of corporations working together to terraform Mars by raising the temperature, increasing the oxygen level, and creating ocean areas. The goal is to make the planet habitable while competing for the most victory points.

Players achieve this by managing resources, building infrastructure, and executing projects to improve the planet's conditions. Each turn, players will choose from a set of action cards representing various technologies, buildings, and other actions that help them progress in their mission. The game features a variety of strategies, allowing players to focus on areas like energy production, ecology, or large-scale constructions.

*Terraforming Mars* offers a dynamic and evolving game experience with plenty of room for strategic planning. The game is played over multiple rounds, with the state of the planet continuously improving. The interaction between the different corporations and their varying abilities makes every game unique, providing a deep and immersive experience for fans of resource management and engine-building games.

name: Terra Mystica
description:
In *Terra Mystica*, players control one of 14 different factions, each with its own unique abilities, in a race to expand their territory and build structures. The game takes place on a large map divided into various terrains, and each faction has a preference for specific terrain types. The goal is to expand your presence, improve your buildings, and score points by developing your civilization.

The game is highly strategic, as players must carefully manage their resources, expand their territory, and decide when and where to build. Each faction has a different approach to development, and players must balance growth with competition for space and resources. The game includes several action phases, where players can improve their economy, develop their cities, and engage in special actions that allow them to earn victory points.

*Terra Mystica* is a deep and intricate game, with a high degree of player interaction. The combination of resource management, territorial control, and faction-specific abilities creates a dynamic and highly strategic experience that varies with each playthrough.

expansions.name: Terra Mystica: Fire & Ice

name: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization
description:
*Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization* is a civilization-building strategy game where players guide their nations through the ages, from ancient times to the modern era. The game focuses on managing resources, developing technologies, advancing culture, and leading military conquests, all while striving for dominance in various aspects of civilization.

Throughout the game, players take turns to build wonders, recruit leaders, develop technologies, and engage in military actions. The game features a unique card-based system that represents different stages of civilization, with players having to choose wisely which advancements to pursue in order to gain victory points. Diplomacy and strategic planning play a key role as players compete for control over limited resources and territories.

*Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization* offers deep strategy and replayability, as the dynamic card system and the variety of possible paths to victory create a constantly evolving experience. The game provides a challenging, immersive experience for players who enjoy long-term strategic planning and the development of complex civilizations.

expansions.name: Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization

name: Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
Ticket to Ride Map Collection 5: United Kingdom & Pennsylvania
Ticket to Ride: India & Switzerland
description:
*Ticket to Ride: 10th Anniversary* is a special edition of the beloved *Ticket to Ride* game, celebrating a decade of train-building fun. In this anniversary edition, players compete to complete train routes across North America by collecting matching colored cards and claiming railway routes on the map.

The game features all the core mechanics of the original *Ticket to Ride* while offering enhanced components, including a custom board, upgraded trains, and special cards to commemorate the 10th anniversary. Players must complete destination tickets, connect cities, and strategize to block their opponents, all while managing their hand of cards and limited actions.

*Ticket to Ride: 10th Anniversary* retains the accessible, family-friendly gameplay of the original but adds a premium feel and collectible elements. It’s perfect for both newcomers and seasoned players, offering the same engaging and competitive train-building experience that has made the game a modern classic.

name: The Twelve Doctors: Doctor Who Card Game
Twilight Struggle
description:
*Twilight Struggle* is a two-player, card-driven strategy game set during the Cold War, where players take on the roles of the United States and the Soviet Union, competing for global influence. The game spans the entire Cold War period, with players using cards to conduct military operations, spread ideology, and engage in diplomacy to dominate various regions of the world.

Each turn, players choose cards representing historical events and use them to perform actions such as placing influence in countries, staging coups, or advancing their own political agenda. The game features a unique blend of strategic depth, historical themes, and tense decision-making as players try to outmaneuver each other to gain dominance without triggering nuclear war.

*Twilight Struggle* offers a deep and immersive experience, with a perfect balance of tension, history, and strategy. The game’s card-driven mechanics and asymmetrical nature create a constantly evolving narrative, making each session feel fresh and challenging. It’s a must-play for fans of history, strategy, and geopolitical games.

name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar
description:
*Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar* is a worker placement strategy game set in the ancient Mayan civilization. Players manage a group of workers and take actions to advance their civilization by collecting resources, building structures, and gaining favor with the gods. The game is centered around the famous Mayan calendar, with players using a unique gear mechanism to control the placement and movement of their workers over time.

In *Tzolk'in*, each turn, players place their workers on rotating gears, each representing a different action. The gears rotate on every turn, and as time passes, workers move to more powerful positions, allowing players to take increasingly valuable actions. Strategic planning is essential, as the timing of when to place and retrieve workers is crucial for maximizing efficiency and achieving victory.

The game offers a deep and engaging experience with intricate decision-making and a strong thematic connection to the Mayan calendar. *Tzolk'in* is ideal for players who enjoy complex strategy games with a unique mechanic and a rich, historical theme.

expansions.name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar – Tribes & Prophecies

name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar – Tribes & Prophecies
description:
*Tribes & Prophecies* is an expansion for *Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar*, adding new layers of strategy and complexity to the base game. The expansion introduces new tribes, each with unique abilities, and new prophecy cards that provide additional objectives and challenges for players to pursue during the game.

With the addition of tribes, each player can now select a tribe at the start of the game, granting them a special ability that can influence their strategy throughout the game. The prophecy cards add an extra level of planning and foresight, as players must work to fulfill the prophecies before the end of the game to earn victory points.

*Tribes & Prophecies* enhances the gameplay of *Tzolk'in*, offering more varied and strategic choices. The new components add depth and replayability to the original game, making it even more challenging and rewarding for fans of the base game.

name: Viticulture
description:
In *Viticulture*, players inherit a small vineyard in rustic Tuscany, with the dream of producing high-quality wines and growing a successful winery. The game is played over several seasons, and each season offers different actions: planting vines, harvesting grapes, aging wines, and fulfilling wine orders for points. Players also attract visitors to their vineyard, who provide unique benefits that can help optimize production.

The challenge lies in managing resources and timing each action to take advantage of the seasonal cycles, as certain actions are only available in specific seasons. Players must balance short-term production goals with long-term strategies for improving their vineyard and earning the most points by the end of the game.

*Viticulture* is a rich, strategic game where each choice influences the success of your winery. The game’s seasonal rhythm, resource management, and variety of visitor cards create an immersive and dynamic experience that can change with each playthrough.

expansions.name: Viticulture: Tuscany

name: Viticulture: Tuscany
description:
*Viticulture: Tuscany* is an expansion for the popular wine-making board game *Viticulture*, adding new mechanics, strategies, and components to enhance the base game. Tuscany introduces new game elements such as the *Grande* workers, the *Tuscany* tiles that modify actions, and new ways to score points with the *Vineyard* cards and *Wine Orders*.

The expansion introduces the *Tuscany* board, which offers different actions and strategies compared to the base game, allowing players to specialize their vineyards further. It also adds new structures to build and additional worker placement options, creating more paths to victory and greater replayability.

*Viticulture: Tuscany* elevates the gameplay experience with its added depth and strategic variety. With new ways to develop your vineyard, customize your game, and compete for victory points, this expansion is perfect for players seeking a more complex and rewarding wine-making experience.

name: Warfighter: The Tactical Special Forces Card Game
Warfighter: The WWII Tactical Combat Card Game
Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game
